en: AR Dr Ayyub Tabet, Mashru' al-nazam al-asasi li-dawlat lubnan (Proposal for the legal foundations of the State of Lebanon), Beirut: Matba'at al-misbah 1926 (printed booklet), 74 arts., 11 pp.
